item.title: 名利场》杂志奥斯卡颁奖晚会已经落下帷幕。以下是出席庆典的明星们的着装：
item.description:
The Vanity Fair Oscar Party has landed.

Here's what the stars wore to the festivities: https://t.co/gOixIfsG0o

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）和马克-朗森（Mark Ronson）登上奥斯卡颁奖典礼的舞台，史诗般地演唱了《芭比娃娃》中的 "I'm Just Ken"。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling and Mark Ronson took to the Oscars stage to deliver an epic performance of "I'm Just Ken" from "Barbie." https://t.co/MhtQHhefPq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在信任谁能更好地领导国家方面，美国人意见不一：拜登、特朗普或都不信任。36% 的美国人相信特朗普能更好地领导总统工作，33% 的人相信拜登，30% 的人既不相信拜登也不相信特朗普。
item.description:
Americans are split on whom they trust to do a better job leading the country: Biden, Trump or neither. 36% of Americans trust Trump to do a better job leading as president, while 33% trust Biden and 30% trust neither, an @ABC News/Ipsos poll finds. https://t.co/CL8zyK25Zn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 从瑞恩-高斯林备受期待的 "I'm Just Ken "表演，到 Da'Vine Joy Randolph 动人的演讲，这是一个值得纪念的夜晚。
item.description:
This year's Academy Awards were jam-packed with memorable moments.

From Ryan Gosling's highly anticipated "I'm Just Ken" performance, to Da'Vine Joy Randolph's moving speech — it was a night to remember.

What was your favorite moment?https://t.co/0SRTijvdLL pic.twitter.com/2ggpMoYYeB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "功夫熊猫 4》是梦工厂动画系列自 2016 年第三部以来的首部电影，其开局比除 2008 年原版之外的所有电影都要好。上周的冠军影片《沙丘》（Dune：第二部 "的成绩也同样不错。
item.description:
“Kung Fu Panda 4,” the first film in the DreamWorks Animation franchise since the third installment in 2016, got off to a better start than all but the 2008 original. The news was just as good for last week’s top film, “Dune: Part Two.” https://t.co/4RachsfE1q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 约翰-穆兰尼对本年度奥斯卡最佳影片得主有非常强烈的看法：1989年的《梦幻田园》。#Oscars#Oscars2024
item.description:
John Mulaney had a very strong opinion on who should have won this year's Oscar for Best Picture: 1989's "Field of Dreams."#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/ELiEnJ0e4g pic.twitter.com/L0UJ2N7eQi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 从瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）演唱的《我只是肯》（I'm Just Ken）到艾玛-斯通（Emma Stone）的撕裙表演，以下是 #Oscars 颁奖典礼上的所有精彩瞬间！
item.description:
From Ryan Gosling's performance of "I'm Just Ken" to Emma Stone's dress ripping, here are all the best moments from the #Oscars! https://t.co/DkGSQ32Res pic.twitter.com/iqY7x99hCW

— Good Morning America (@GMA) March 11, 2024

item.title: 俄克拉荷马州的一些教师说，他们害怕教授一本书，而这本书正是今年最受关注的电影之一《花月杀手》的基础。
item.description:
Some teachers in Oklahoma say they are afraid to teach a book that is the foundation of "Killers of the Flower Moon," one the most talked about films of the year. https://t.co/FEeOxhTVts

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: Billie Eilish 和 Finneas O'Connell 获得了奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲奖。这对兄妹组合的热门歌曲《芭比娃娃》中的 "What Was I Made For? "是他们第二次获得奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲奖。
item.description:
Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell won the Oscar for Best Original Song.

The sibling duo's hit song, "What Was I Made For?" from "Barbie," marked their second Oscar win for Best Original Song. https://t.co/o0WFPNgIJT pic.twitter.com/Hk4FiWcHYt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 名利场》杂志奥斯卡颁奖晚会已经落下帷幕。以下是出席庆典的明星们的着装：
item.description:
The Vanity Fair Oscar Party has landed.

Here's what the stars wore to the festivities: https://t.co/eX8oSVtx4w

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 迈克尔-甘本（Michael Gambon）、奇塔-里维拉（Chita Rivera）、艾伦-阿金（Alan Arkin）、安德烈-布劳赫（Andre Braugher）、马修-佩里（Mathew Perry）、理查德-刘易斯（Richard Lewis）、李善均（Lee Sun-Kyun）和卡尔-韦瑟斯（Carl Weathers）等明星都在 "悼念 "环节中逝世。
item.description:
The Oscars paid tribute to those in the entertainment industry who died in the past year during the "In Memoriam" segment.

Michael Gambon, Chita Rivera, Alan Arkin, Andre Braugher, Mathew Perry, Richard Lewis, Lee Sun-Kyun and Carl Weathers were some of the stars remembered. pic.twitter.com/oYFBk7dTvM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在奥斯卡颁奖之夜，《奥本海默》获得了包括最佳影片和最佳导演在内的七项大奖。"芭比娃娃 "获得了一项大奖，比莉-艾利什和芬尼亚斯-奥康纳尔获得了奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲奖 "What Was I Made For?" #Oscars#Oscars2024
item.description:
On Oscars night, "Oppenheimer" scored seven awards, including Best Picture and Best Director.

"Barbie" won one award, with Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell taking the Oscar for Best Original Song, "What Was I Made For?"#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/ELiEnJ0e4g pic.twitter.com/utlUjMQWbk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》周日荣获奥斯卡最佳影片奖，演员阿尔-帕西诺（Al Pacino）为庆祝《教父》第二部问世 50 周年颁发了该奖项。
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" won the Oscar for Best Picture on Sunday, with actor Al Pacino presenting the category in celebration of the 50th anniversary of "The Godfather Part II." https://t.co/rfUibGfAnH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 艾玛-斯通凭借在《可怜的事》中的出色表演获得了奥斯卡最佳女主角奖。在获奖感言中，斯通对该奖项的其他提名者表示了感谢。
item.description:
Emma Stone won the Best Actress Oscar for her performance in "Poor Things."

In her acceptance speech, Stone acknowledged her fellow nominees in the category. https://t.co/PyRYjD65Wv pic.twitter.com/mewoGiqk74

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 克里斯托弗-诺兰凭借《奥本海默》获得奥斯卡最佳导演奖。在获奖感言中，诺兰感谢了电影所根据的传记《美国普罗米修斯》的作者凯-伯德（Kai Bird）和马丁-J-谢尔文（Martin J. Sherwin）。
item.description:
Christopher Nolan won the Oscar for Best Director for "Oppenheimer."

During his acceptance speech, Nolan thanked the authors of the biography on which the movie is based, "American Prometheus," by Kai Bird and Martin J. Sherwin. https://t.co/549dZJTiT7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》摘得奥斯卡最佳影片奖！#Oscars#Oscars2024
item.description:
“Oppenheimer" takes home the Oscar for Best Picture!#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/NDNogoSpjK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 爆料：最佳影片奖颁给了奥本海默电影公司#奥斯卡奖 #Oppenheimer
item.description:
BREAKING: @TheAcademy Award for Best Picture goes to @OppenheimerFilm. #Oscars #Oppenheimerhttps://t.co/hNNLxVB1a7 pic.twitter.com/zD49s2eA8W

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "桑德拉、安妮特、凯瑞、莉莉：我与你们分享这一刻。我敬畏你们。"艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》获得奥斯卡最佳女主角奖。
item.description:
"Sandra, Annette, Carey, Lily: I share this with you. I am in awe of you."

Emma Stone accepts the Oscar for Best Actress for "Poor Things."#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/YfXFufYoBG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "我的裙子破了。我敢肯定是在《I'm Just Ken》中发生的。"艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》获得奥斯卡最佳女主角，她的获奖感言开头十分搞笑。
item.description:
"My dress is broken. I'm pretty sure it happened during 'I'm Just Ken.'"

Emma Stone has a hilarious start to her Oscars acceptance speech for Best Actress for "Poor Things."#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/pynAPcDeUL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 打破：艾玛-斯通凭借《贫民窟》获得奥斯卡女主角奖。#奥斯卡奖
item.description:
BREAKING: @TheAcademy Award for Actress in a Leading Role goes to Emma Stone in @PoorThingsFilm. #Oscars https://t.co/hNNLxVB1a7 pic.twitter.com/tlzLOqtg2p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 饰演物理学家、原子弹之父罗伯特-奥本海默（J. Robert Oppenheimer）的西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）获得了奥斯卡最佳男演员奖。
item.description:
Cillian Murphy won the Oscar for Best Actor for his role in "Oppenheimer."

The actor, who portrayed physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer, the father of the atomic bomb, said he was "overwhelmed" to have won the award. https://t.co/EWUzMo2ThN pic.twitter.com/hSW2yi8hbz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 克里斯托弗-诺兰凭借《奥本海默》首次获得奥斯卡导演成就奖。
item.description:
Christopher Nolan accepts his first Oscar for Achievement in Directing for “Oppenheimer.”#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/sSS0yqMOET

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》荣获奥斯卡最佳原创配乐奖：
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" won the Oscar for Best Original Score.

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/hWvqU9ifwy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）凭借《奥本海默电影》（@OppenheimerFilm）荣获@奥斯卡导演奖。#奥斯卡奖 #奥本海默
item.description:

item.title: 西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）凭借《奥本海默》获得奥斯卡最佳男主角奖。这是他第一次获得奥斯卡奖，也是第一次获得提名。#Oscars#Oscars2024
item.description:
Cillian Murphy accepts the Oscar for Best Actor for “Oppenheimer.” It's his first Oscar win and first nomination.#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/DjRn9ahzyF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 爆炸：@奥本海默电影中的西里安-墨菲获得@奥斯卡男主角奖。#奥斯卡 #奥本海默
item.description:

item.description:
